channel.title: CVE Feed for Emerson -- Wireless 1410 Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Emerson -- Wireless 1410 Gateway

item.title: CVE-2020-12030|2024-08-04T11:48:57.679Z -- emerson -- wireless%201410%20gateway
item.description: There is a flaw in the code used to configure the internal gateway firewall when the gateway's VLAN feature is enabled. If a user enables the VLAN setting, the internal gateway firewall becomes disabled resulting in exposure of all ports used by the gateway.
